name: Taiku
description:
Toru is a shy student who is in love with his classmate Sakura. Toru gathers enough courage to confess, so he sends a letter to her telling her that they will meet under the cherry tree outside the city.

But a fever has spread across the school. Toru will have to avoid getting infected before meeting Sakura.

This game was develop in 2018 as a final higher tecnical degree. Any semblance with the covid pandemic it's a coincidence.

Developers (Toshi Games):

  • Víctor Aguilera (Game Designer, Artist)
  • Nils Aguila (Programmer, Artist, Level Designer)
  • Ignasi Capellà (Artist)
  • Albert Codina (Artist)
